Tobacco use and exposure
How soon after you wake up do, or did, you smoke your first cigarette [FTND]

Are you considering quitting smoking during the next 6 months [PLCO]
During the past 12 months, did any doctor, dentist, nurse, or any other health professional advise you to quit smoking [PLCO]

For The Past 1 Month, Have You Ever Felt That Your Circumstances Were Insufficient To Live Humanly?
For the past 1 month, have you ever felt uncertain or uneasy about your future?
